# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $200 by me due to its high-quality materials and innovative features. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $180 for you to experience its excellence. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to enjoy the benefits of our product while also getting a great deal. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
